entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cache Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 7.
